page.title: 01WITHYHAM/ST.JOHN BY CAR
page.content: Mardens Hill is steep with a good view of the{landscape}of woodlands.It is just wide enough for two cars to pass.It is not normally very busy.At the bottom of the hill there is a stream which boys like to play in.A quarter of the way up the hill there is a Nursery.We turn right at friars gate.There are a few cottages before we got to the Half Moon{Pub.}The{road we turn into is not in very good condition and is not wide enough for two cars to pass. There is a boule pitch made with gravel and strips of wood.On the right there is a sign saying that there is a{Sewage Works down the track. We come to a farm called White House Farm.There is lots of farm equipment and tractors for hire and for use on the farm.At the end of the road there are two white farm cottages.
